subject: College World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bryan Petersen ended the longest game in College World Series history with a run-scoring single in the bottom of the 13th inning, giving California-Irvine a 5-4 victory against Cal State Fullerton.
snippet: Bryan Petersen ended the longest game in College World Series history with a run-scoring single in the bottom of the 13th inning, giving California-Irvine a 5-4 victory against Cal State Fullerton.
